item.title: Connecticut settles lawsuit over convict's killing of visiting nurse for $2 million
item.description: Connecticut officials have agreed to a $2.25 million settlement of a lawsuit over a sex offender’s killing of visiting nurse Joyce Grayson in 2023

item.title: Maine wardens rescue moose trapped for hours in abandoned well
item.description: A bull moose that fell into an abandoned well in Maine was pulled to safety during an elaborate five hour rescue

item.title: Girl shot in head in Minneapolis church attack making 'miraculous' progress: Family
item.description: The family of a 12-year-old girl critically wounded during the deadly shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic church says she is making remarkable progress

item.title: More than 160,000 apply for Florida's first bear hunt in a decade, official says
item.description: Florida’s first bear hunt in a decade drew more than 160,000 applicants for just 172 permits

item.title: 'Everything’s frozen for you': Stopped on the street by NYC police, France's Macron calls ... Trump
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has shown he can reach President Donald Trump anytime
